trans-unit.source: Transforms XML data using an Extensible Stylesheet Language for Transformations (XSLT) style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Overfører XML-dataene ved hjelp av et omfattende stilarket språk for stilarket som transformeringer (XSLT).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The XslTransform class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> XslTransform klassen som er foreldet i Microsoft .NET Framework, versjon 2.0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is the new XSLT processor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>klassen er den nye XSLT-prosessoren.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av XslCompiledTransform klassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [overføring fra XslTransform klasse.](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: XslTransform supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: XslTransform støtter syntaksen XSLT 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the namespace `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.
trans-unit.target: XSLT-stilarket må bruke navneområdet `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.source: Additional arguments can also be added to the style sheet using the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList> class.
trans-unit.target: Flere argumenter kan også være lagt til stilarket med <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>klasse.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>

trans-unit.source: This class contains input parameters for the style sheet and extension objects which can be called from the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen inneholder inndataparametere for stilen ark og filtypen objekter som kan kalles fra stilarket.

trans-unit.source: To transform XML data: 1.
trans-unit.target: Å gjøre XML-dataene: 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an XslTransform object.
trans-unit.target: Opprett et XslTransform-objekt.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> method to load the style sheet for the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>metode for å laste inn stilarket for transformasjonen.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has several overloads and can load a style sheet using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>, or a URL with the location of the file.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har flere overbelastninger og kan laste inn en stil arket ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>, eller en URL-adresse med plasseringen av filen.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A> method to transform the XML data.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A>metode for å gjøre om XML-data.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has several overloads and can handle different types of input and output.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har flere overbelastninger og kan håndtere forskjellige typer inndata og utdata.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList> containing additional arguments to use as input during the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>som inneholder flere argumenter skal brukes som inndata under transformeringen.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>

trans-unit.source: **Security Considerations** When creating an application that uses the XslTransform class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications: - Extension objects are enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: **Sikkerhetshensyn** når du oppretter et program som bruker klassen XslTransform, må du være klar over følgende elementer og hvordan virker:-utvidelse objekter er aktivert som standard.

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList> object containing extension objects is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A> method, they are utilized.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>objekt som inneholder utvidelsen objekter som er sendt til den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A>metoden de benyttet.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>

trans-unit.source: - XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks.
trans-unit.target: -XSLT stilark kan inneholde referanser til andre filer og innebygde Skriptblokkene.

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed will cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources.
trans-unit.target: En bruker med onde hensikter kan utnytte dette ved å oppgi du med data eller stil ark som når den kjøres vil føre til at datamaskinen for å behandle før datamaskinen kjører lite ressurser.

trans-unit.source: - XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing.
trans-unit.target: -XSLT programmer som kjører i et miljø i blandet klarering kan medføre stil arket forfalskning.

trans-unit.source: For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A> method and executes the transformation.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en ondsinnet bruker kan laste inn et objekt med en skadelig stilarket og leverer den til en annen bruker som senere kaller den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A>metoden og utfører transformeringen.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: These security issues can be mitigated by not accepting XslTransform objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Disse sikkerhetsproblemer kan begrenses ved å ikke godta XslTransform objekter, XSLT stilark eller XML-kildedataene fra uklarerte kilder.

trans-unit.source: **Scripting Support** This class supports embedded scripting using the `msxsl:script` element.
trans-unit.target: **Skripting støtte** denne klassen støtter innebygd skript ved hjelp av den `msxsl:script` elementet.

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the .NET Framework, the evidence of the style sheet determines what permissions are given to embedded scripts.
trans-unit.target: I versjon 1.1 av .NET Framework avgjør bevis på stilarket som hvilke tillatelser er gitt til innebygde skript.

trans-unit.source: - If the style sheet was loaded from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI), the URI is used to create the evidence.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis stilarket som ble lastet inn fra en URI Uniform Resource Identifier (), URIEN til å opprette bevis.

trans-unit.source: This evidence includes the URI along with its site and zone.
trans-unit.target: Denne bevis inneholder URIEN sammen med sin området og sone.

trans-unit.source: - If the style sheet was loaded using another source, you can provide evidence by passing a <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence?displayProperty=fullName> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis stilarket som ble lastet inn med en annen kilde, kan du angi bevis ved å sende en <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence?displayProperty=fullName>objekt i <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>metode.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the script assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: Ellers har skript-samlingen fullstendig klarering.

trans-unit.source: Semi-trusted callers: `UnmanagedCode` permission is required to compile the embedded script.
trans-unit.target: Bare klarerte brukere: `UnmanagedCode` tillatelse kreves for å kompilere innebygde skriptet.

trans-unit.source: `ControlEvidence` permission is required to provide <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `ControlEvidence`tillatelsen kreves for å angi <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>til den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown if the caller does not have the necessary permissions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>oppstår hvis oppkalleren ikke har de nødvendige tillatelsene.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>for mer informasjon.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `msxsl:script` element has the following requirements: - The `msxsl:script` element belongs to the `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt` namespace.
trans-unit.target: Den `msxsl:script` elementet har følgende krav: - `msxsl:script` elementet tilhører den `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt` navneområde.

trans-unit.source: The style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:msxsl=urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`.
trans-unit.target: Stilarket må inneholde navneområdedeklarasjon `xmlns:msxsl=urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`.

trans-unit.source: - The `msxsl:script` element can include a `language` attribute that specifies the scripting language to use.
trans-unit.target: - `msxsl:script` Element kan inneholde en `language` attributt som angir skriptspråket som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `language` attribute must be one of the following: C#, CSharp, VB, VisualBasic, JScript, or JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den `language` attributtet må være én av følgende: C#, c Sharp, VB, VisualBasic, JScript eller JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: Because the language name is not case-sensitive, JavaScript and javascript are both valid.
trans-unit.target: Fordi språknavnet skiller, er JavaScript og javascript både ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: If a `language` attribute is not specified, it defaults to JScript.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en `language` attributtet ikke er angitt, brukes som standard JScript.

trans-unit.source: - The `msxsl:script` element must include an `implements-prefix` attribute that contains the prefix representing the namespace associated with the script block.
trans-unit.target: - `msxsl:script` Elementet må inneholde en `implements-prefix` attributt som inneholder prefikset som representerer navneområdet som er forbundet med Skriptblokken.

trans-unit.source: This namespace must be defined within the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Dette navneområdet må være definert i stilarket.

trans-unit.source: A style sheet can include multiple script blocks which are grouped by namespace.
trans-unit.target: En stilarket kan inneholde flere Skriptblokkene som grupperes etter navneområde.

trans-unit.source: You cannot have script blocks with multiple languages within the same namespace.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke ha Skriptblokkene med flere språk i samme navneområde.

trans-unit.source: Script blocks can call a function defined in another script block, provided the script blocks reside within the same namespace.
trans-unit.target: Skriptblokkene kan kalle en funksjon som er definert i en annen skriptblokk, angitt i Skriptblokkene ligge i samme navneområde.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a script block are parsed according to the rules and syntax of the scripting language (supplied by the `language` attribute).
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i en skriptblokk analyseres i henhold til reglene og syntaksen skriptspråket (angitt av den `language` attributt).

trans-unit.source: For example, if you had a C# script block, comments would be prefixed by the `//` characters.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du har hatt en C# skriptblokk, kommentarer vil få et prefiks fra den `//` tegn.

trans-unit.source: The comments must be valid XML content.
trans-unit.target: Kommentarene må være gyldig XML-innholdet.

trans-unit.source: `Note` It is recommended that you wrap script blocks in a CDATA section.
trans-unit.target: `Note`Det anbefales at du bryte Skriptblokkene i CDATA-del.

trans-unit.source: ``` <msxsl:script implements-prefix='xy' language='C#'> <![CDATA[ // Add code here. ]]> </msxsl:script> ``` Functions can be declared within the `msxsl:script` element.
trans-unit.target: ``` <msxsl:script implements-prefix='xy' language='C#'> <![CDATA[ // Add code here. ]]> </msxsl:script> ```Funksjoner kan deklareres innenfor den `msxsl:script` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the namespaces that are supported by default.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser navneområdene som støttes av standard.

trans-unit.source: |Supported Namespaces|Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`System`|System classes.| |`System.Collection`|Collection classes.| |`System.Text`|Text handling classes.| |`System.Xml`|Core XML classes.| |`System.Xml.Xsl`|XSLT classes.| |`System.Xml.XPath`|XML Path Language (XPath) classes.| The supplied arguments and return values defined by the script functions must be one of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) types listed below.
trans-unit.target: | Støttede navneområder | Beskrivelse | |--------------------------|-----------------| | `System`| Systemklasser. | | `System.Collection`| Samlingsklasser. | | `System.Text`| Tekst som behandler klasser. | | `System.Xml`| Core XML-klasser. | | `System.Xml.Xsl`| XSLT-klasser. | | `System.Xml.XPath`| XML Path Language (XPath) klasser. | Den angitte argumenter og som er definert av funksjonene skriptet må være en av typene det World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: The following table details the mapping between the W3C types, either XPath or XSLT, and the corresponding .NET Framework classes.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor detaljer tilordningen mellom W3C-typer, XPath eller XSLT-filen, og de tilsvarende .NET Framework-klassene.

trans-unit.source: |W3C Type|Equivalent .NET class| |--------------|---------------------------| |String (XPath)|`System.String`| |Boolean (XPath)|`System.Boolean`| |Number (XPath)|`System.Double`| |Result Tree Fragment (XSLT)|`System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator`| |Node Set (XPath)|`System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator`| If the script function utilizes one of the following numeric types: Int16, UInt16, Int32, UInt32, Int64, UInt64, Single, or Decimal, these types are coerced to Double, which maps to the W3C XPath type number.
trans-unit.target: | W3C-typen | Tilsvarende .NET klassen | |--------------|---------------------------| | Streng (XPath) | `System.String`| | Boolsk verdi (XPath) | `System.Boolean`| | Antall (XPath) | `System.Double`| | Resultat tre Fragment (XSLT) | `System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator`| | Node Set (XPath) | `System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator`| Hvis skriptfunksjonen bruker ett av følgende typer numerisk: Int16 UInt16, Int32, UInt32, Int64, UInt64, enkel eller Decimal, disse typene er tvinges til doble som tilordnes til hvor W3C XPath-typen.

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown when a function is called that cannot convert the argument result to one of the required types.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak under kalles en funksjon som kan ikke konvertere resultatet argumentet til en av typene som er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > `msxsl:script` and `msxsl:node-list` are the only functions from the `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt` namespace that are supported by the XslTransform class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > `msxsl:script` og `msxsl:node-list` er bare funksjoner fra den `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt` navneområdet som støttes av XslTransform-klassen.

trans-unit.source: XslTransform has the ability to utilize common language runtime (CLR) code as an extension mechanism.
trans-unit.target: XslTransform har mulighet til å bruke felles language runtime (CLR) kode som en utvidelse mekanisme.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by passing an instance of a class to the XslTransform class and calling its public methods within an XSLT style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ved å sende en forekomst av en klasse til klassen som XslTransform og kaller offentlige metodene i en XSLT-stilarket.

trans-unit.source: Methods that are defined with the `params` keyword, which allows an unspecified number of parameters to be passed, do not work correctly in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: Metodene som er definert med den `params` nøkkelord, slik at et angitt antall parametere som skal sendes, fungerer ikke i dette scenarioet.

trans-unit.source: See [params](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more details.
trans-unit.target: Se [params](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for flere detaljer.

trans-unit.source: For more information see [XSLT Transformations with the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon se [XSLT-transformeringen med klassen XslTransform](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Loads the XSLT style sheet specified by a URL.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn XSLT-stilarket som er angitt av en URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>klassen er foreldet i .NET Framework, versjon 2.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is the new XSLT processor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>klassen er den nye XSLT-prosessoren.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av XslCompiledTransform klassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [overføring fra XslTransform klasse.](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>støtter syntaksen XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl=``http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.
trans-unit.target: XSLT-stilarket må inneholde navneområdedeklarasjon `xmlns:xsl=``http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.source: This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden laster inn XSLT-stilarket, inkludert eventuelle stilark som det refereres til i `xsl:include` og `xsl:import` elementer.

trans-unit.source: External resources are resolved using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Eksterne ressurser oversettes ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>med ingen legitimasjonsbeskrivelse.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: Hvis stilen ark ligger på en nettverksressurs som krever godkjenning, bruker overbelastningen som tar en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>som ett av argumentene og angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>med legitimasjonen som er nødvendig.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis stilarket som inneholder innebygde skripting, kompilert skriptet med en samling.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the style sheet is used to create evidence, which is applied to the assembly.
trans-unit.target: URIEN på stilarket som brukes til å opprette bevis som brukes til samlingen.

trans-unit.source: For issues with the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: Problemer med den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>metoden og stil ark med innebygde skript, se artikkel Q316755 i Microsoft Knowledge Base på http://support.microsoft.com.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis oppkalleren ikke har `UnmanagedCode` tillatelse, innebygde skriptet er ikke kompilert og en <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>for mer informasjon.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>

trans-unit.source: The URL that specifies the XSLT style sheet to load.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen som angir XSLT-stilarket ikke laste inn.

trans-unit.source: The loaded resource is not a valid style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Laste inn ressursen er ikke en gyldig stilarket.

trans-unit.source: The style sheet contains embedded script, and the caller does not have <xref uid="langword_csharp_UnmanagedCode" name="UnmanagedCode" href=""></xref> permission.
trans-unit.target: Stilarket som inneholder innebygde skript og oppkalleren har ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_UnmanagedCode" name="UnmanagedCode" href=""> </xref> tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: Loads the XSLT style sheet contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn XSLT-stilarket i <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>klassen er foreldet i .NET Framework, versjon 2.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is the new XSLT processor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>klassen er den nye XSLT-prosessoren.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av XslCompiledTransform klassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [overføring fra XslTransform klasse.](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>støtter syntaksen XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.
trans-unit.target: XSLT-stilarket må inneholde navneområdedeklarasjon `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.source: This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden laster inn XSLT-stilarket, inkludert eventuelle stilark som det refereres til i `xsl:include` og `xsl:import` elementer.

trans-unit.source: External resources are resolved using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Eksterne ressurser oversettes ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>med ingen legitimasjonsbeskrivelse.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: Hvis stilen ark ligger på en nettverksressurs som krever godkjenning, bruker overbelastningen som tar en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>som ett av argumentene og angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>med legitimasjonen som er nødvendig.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: The style sheet loads from the current node of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> through all its children.
trans-unit.target: Stilarket som laster inn fra den gjeldende noden for den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>gjennom alle underordnede verdier.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan bruke en del av et dokument som stilarket.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> method returns, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>metoden returnerer den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>plasseres på den neste noden etter slutten på stilarket.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the end of the document is reached, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned at the end of file (EOF).
trans-unit.target: Hvis slutten av dokumentet er nådd, den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>er plassert i slutten av filen (EOF).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that can resolve entities (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns `true`).
trans-unit.target: Hvis inneholder stilarket enheter, må du angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>som kan løse enheter (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returnerer `true`).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: In this case, an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> can be used.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet en <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>kan brukes.</xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis stilarket som inneholder innebygde skripting, kompilert skriptet med en samling.

trans-unit.source: The assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen har fullstendig klarering.

trans-unit.source: The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Den anbefalte fremgangsmåten er å angi bevis ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>

trans-unit.source: For issues with the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: Problemer med den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>metoden og stil ark med innebygde skript, se artikkel Q316755 i Microsoft Knowledge Base på http://support.microsoft.com.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis oppkalleren ikke har `UnmanagedCode` tillatelse, innebygde skriptet er ikke kompilert og en <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av XslCompiledTransform klassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [overføring fra XslTransform klasse.](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>støtter syntaksen XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.
trans-unit.target: XSLT-stilarket må inneholde navneområdedeklarasjon `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.source: This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden laster inn XSLT-stilarket, inkludert eventuelle stilark som det refereres til i `xsl:include` og `xsl:import` elementer.

trans-unit.source: The style sheet loads from the current node of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> through all its children.
trans-unit.target: Stilarket som laster inn fra den gjeldende noden for den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>gjennom alle underordnede verdier.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan bruke en del av et dokument som stilarket.

trans-unit.source: After the Load method returns, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Når den Versjonsuavhengige innlastingsmetoden returnerer, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>plasseres på den neste noden etter slutten på stilarket.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If the end of the document is reached, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned at the end of file (EOF).
trans-unit.target: Hvis slutten av dokumentet er nådd, den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>er plassert i slutten av filen (EOF).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that can resolve entities (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns `true`).
trans-unit.target: Hvis inneholder stilarket enheter, må du angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>som kan løse enheter (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returnerer `true`).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: In this case, an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> can be used.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet en <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>kan brukes.</xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis stilarket som inneholder innebygde skripting, kompilert skriptet med en samling.

trans-unit.source: The assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen har fullstendig klarering.

trans-unit.source: The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Den anbefalte fremgangsmåten er å angi bevis ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>

trans-unit.source: For issues with the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> method and style sheets with embedded scripts see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: Problemer med den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>metoden og stil ark med innebygde skript se artikkel Q316755 i Microsoft Knowledge Base på http://support.microsoft.com.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis oppkalleren ikke har `UnmanagedCode` tillatelse, innebygde skriptet er ikke kompilert og en <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: There are different ways to provide evidence.
trans-unit.target: Det er forskjellige måter å levere bevis.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes what type of evidence to provide for common user scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver hvilken type bevis oppgi for vanlige scenarier for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object containing the style sheet to load.

trans-unit.target: Den `xsl:output` elementet støttes ikke når du sender til et <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>(den `xsl:output` elementet ignoreres).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å gjøre en asynkron transformering i kildedokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjoner gjelder dokumentet som en helhet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis du sender i en node enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> containing just the node fragment and pass that <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil transformere en node-fragment, må du opprette en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>som inneholder bare noden fragmenter og sende som <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>til metoden transformeringen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment.
trans-unit.target: Følgende eksempel utfører en transformering på en node-fragment.

trans-unit.source: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ``` The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console.
trans-unit.target: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ```Eksemplet bruker den `library.xml` og `print_root.xsl` filer som inndata og genererer følgende til konsollen.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>støtter syntaksen XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.
trans-unit.target: XSLT-stilarket må inneholde navneområdedeklarasjon `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.source: The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Den `args` sammenlignes med den `xsl:param` elementer som er definert i stilarket.

trans-unit.source: The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjonen valgene gjelder dokumentet som en helhet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis den gjeldende noden angis på en nodetre enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: After the transformation has been performed, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> remains in its original state.
trans-unit.target: Etter at transformeringen er utført, den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>forblir i sin opprinnelige tilstand.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the Transform method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at noden som er gjeldende før transformasjonen prosessen, forblir den gjeldende noden når av transformeringen har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> provides read-only output, the `xsl:output` element is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Fordi <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>gir skrivebeskyttet utdata i `xsl:output` elementet ignoreres.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis du sender i en node enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> containing just the node fragment and pass that <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil transformere en node-fragment, må du opprette en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>som inneholder bare noden fragmenter og sende som <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>til metoden transformeringen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment.
trans-unit.target: Følgende eksempel utfører en transformering på en node-fragment.

trans-unit.source: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ``` The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console.
trans-unit.target: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ```Eksemplet bruker den `library.xml` og `print_root.xsl` filer som inndata og genererer følgende til konsollen.

Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ``` The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console.

Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ```Eksemplet bruker den `library.xml` og `print_root.xsl` filer som inndata og genererer følgende til konsollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is the new XSLT processor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>klassen er den nye XSLT-prosessoren.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>støtter syntaksen XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.
trans-unit.target: XSLT-stilarket må inneholde navneområdedeklarasjon `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.source: The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet.

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å gjøre en asynkron transformering i kildedokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjoner gjelder dokumentet som en helhet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis du sender i en node enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> containing just the node fragment, and pass that <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil transformere en node-fragment, må du opprette en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>som inneholder bare noden fragmenter og sende som <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>til metoden transformeringen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment.
trans-unit.target: Følgende eksempel utfører en transformering på en node-fragment.

trans-unit.source: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console.
trans-unit.target: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ```Eksemplet bruker den `library.xml` og `print_root.xsl` filer som inndata og genererer følgende til konsollen.

trans-unit.source: The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjonen valgene gjelder dokumentet som en helhet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis den gjeldende noden angis på en nodetre enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: After the transformation has been performed, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> remains in its original state.
trans-unit.target: Etter at transformeringen er utført, den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>forblir i sin opprinnelige tilstand.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the Transform method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at noden som er gjeldende før transformasjonen prosessen, forblir den gjeldende noden når av transformeringen har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.target: Den `args` sammenlignes med den `xsl:param` elementer som er definert i stilarket.

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjoner gjelder dokumentet som en helhet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis du sender i en node enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> containing just the node fragment and pass that <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil transformere en node-fragment, må du opprette en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>som inneholder bare noden fragmenter og sende som <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>til metoden transformeringen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment.
trans-unit.target: Følgende eksempel utfører en transformering på en node-fragment.

trans-unit.source: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console.
trans-unit.target: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ```Eksemplet bruker den `library.xml` og `print_root.xsl` filer som inndata og genererer følgende til konsollen.

source.ph: ``` Passing <book genre="novel" ISBN="1-861001-57-5"><title>Pride And Prejudice</title></book> to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ```
`library.xml`
``` <library> <book genre='novel' ISBN='1-861001-57-5'> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> <book genre='novel' ISBN='1-81920-21-2'> <title>Hook</title> </book> </library> ```
`print_root.xsl`

``` <style sheet version="1.0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" > <output method="text" /> <template match="/"> Root node is <value-of select="local-name(//*[position() = 1])" /> </template> </style sheet> ```

target.ph: ``` Passing <book genre="novel" ISBN="1-861001-57-5"><title>Pride And Prejudice</title></book> to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ```
`library.xml`
``` <library> <book genre='novel' ISBN='1-861001-57-5'> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> <book genre='novel' ISBN='1-81920-21-2'> <title>Hook</title> </book> </library> ```
`print_root.xsl`

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework, this can be either an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> (typically an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>), or an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> containing the data to be transformed.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten du vil sende.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> brukes til å løse XSLT `document()` funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: If this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the `document()` function is not resolved.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, `document()` funksjonen ikke er løst.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the XML data in the using the specified args and outputs the result to a .
trans-unit.target: Overfører XML-dataene i den ved hjelp av den angitte args , og resultatet som .

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>klassen er foreldet i .NET Framework, versjon 2.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is the new XSLT processor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>klassen er den nye XSLT-prosessoren.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av XslCompiledTransform klassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [overføring fra XslTransform klasse.](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>støtter syntaksen XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.
trans-unit.target: XSLT-stilarket må inneholde navneområdedeklarasjon `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.source: The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Den `args` sammenlignes med den `xsl:param` elementer som er definert i stilarket.

trans-unit.source: The encoding attribute on an `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Attributtet koding på en `xsl:output` elementet støttes ikke når du sender til <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported.
trans-unit.target: Se [utdataene fra en XslTransform](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for detaljene som `xsl:output` attributter støttes.

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjoner gjelder dokumentet som en helhet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis du sender i en node enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> containing just the node fragment and pass that <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil transformere en node-fragment, må du opprette en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>som inneholder bare noden fragmenter og sende som <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>til metoden transformeringen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment.
trans-unit.target: Følgende eksempel utfører en transformering på en node-fragment.

trans-unit.source: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console.
trans-unit.target: ``` XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ```Eksemplet bruker den `library.xml` og `print_root.xsl` filer som inndata og genererer følgende til konsollen.

trans-unit.source: The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjonen valgene gjelder dokumentet som en helhet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis den gjeldende noden angis på en nodetre enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: After the transformation has been performed, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> remains in its original state.
trans-unit.target: Etter at transformeringen er utført, den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>forblir i sin opprinnelige tilstand.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the Transform method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at noden som er gjeldende før transformasjonen prosessen, forblir den gjeldende noden når av transformeringen har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: There was an error processing the XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under behandling XSLT-transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: Note: This is a change in behavior from earlier versions.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltException"></xref> is thrown if you are using Microsoft .NET Framework version 1.1 or earlier.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltException"> </xref> oppstår hvis du bruker Microsoft .NET Framework, versjon 1.1 eller tidligere.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the XML data in the using the specified args and outputs the result to a .
trans-unit.target: Overfører XML-dataene i den ved hjelp av den angitte args , og resultatet som .

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>klassen er foreldet i .NET Framework, versjon 2.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is the new XSLT processor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>klassen er den nye XSLT-prosessoren.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ved hjelp av XslCompiledTransform klassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [overføring fra XslTransform klasse.](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>støtter syntaksen XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.
trans-unit.target: XSLT-stilarket må inneholde navneområdedeklarasjon `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`.

trans-unit.source: The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Den `args` sammenlignes med den `xsl:param` elementer som er definert i stilarket.

trans-unit.source: The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjonen valgene gjelder dokumentet som en helhet.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, hvis den gjeldende noden angis på en nodetre enn rotnoden dokumentet, hindrer dette ikke prosessen transformasjonen tilgang til alle nodene i innlastet dokument.

trans-unit.source: After the transformation is performed, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> remains in its original state.
trans-unit.target: Når transformasjonen som utføres av <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>forblir i sin opprinnelige tilstand.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the Transform method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at noden som er gjeldende før transformasjonen prosessen, forblir den gjeldende noden når av transformeringen har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: The encoding attribute on an `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Attributtet koding på en `xsl:output` elementet støttes ikke når du sender til <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported.
trans-unit.target: Se [utdataene fra en XslTransform](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for detaljene som `xsl:output` attributter støttes.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> containing the data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> som inneholder data om.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> containing the namespace-qualified arguments used as input to the transformation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref> som inneholder navneområdet kvalifisert argumentene som brukes som inndata transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>til som du vil sende.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> used to resolve the XSLT `document()` function.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> brukes til å løse XSLT `document()` funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: If this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the `document()` function is not resolved.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, `document()` funksjonen ikke er løst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> is not cached after the Transform method completes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> hurtigbufres etter metoden transformeringen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> used to resolve external resources when the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> brukes til å løse eksterne ressurser når den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform*>-metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>klassen er foreldet i .NET Framework, versjon 2.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the .NET Framework, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior: `Fully trusted code:` A default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials is used to resolve the `document()` function.
trans-unit.target: I versjon 1.1 av .NET Framework, bestemmer klareringsnivået for applikasjonen standard virkemåte: `Fully trusted code:` standard <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>med ingen bruker legitimasjonen som brukes til å løse den `document()` funksjonen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If authentication is required to access the external resource, use this property to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: Hvis godkjenning kreves for å få tilgang til eksterne ressursen, kan du bruke denne egenskapen til å angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>med legitimasjonen som er nødvendig.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` The property is set to `null`, which means the `document()` function is not resolved.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:`Egenskapen er satt til `null`, noe som betyr den `document()` funksjonen ikke er løst.

trans-unit.source: Because full trust is required to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>, this property also cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: Fordi fullstendig klarering kreves for å angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>, denne egenskapen også kan ikke angis.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: This resolver is used when the XSLT `document()` function is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Denne løsningen brukes når XSLT `document()` funksjonen aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: It is not used to resolve `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements referenced in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Det brukes ikke til å løse `xsl:import` og `xsl:include` elementer som det refereres til i stilarket.

trans-unit.source: To specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> to use to resolve `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements referenced in the style sheet, use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> overload, which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments.
trans-unit.target: Angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>brukes til å løse `xsl:import` og `xsl:include` elementer som det refereres til i stilarket bruker den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A>overbelaste som tar en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>som ett av argumentene.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is obsolete in version 1.1 of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen er foreldet i .NET Framework-versjonen 1.1.

trans-unit.source: Specifying an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> using the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A> method is the recommended practice.
trans-unit.target: Angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A>metoden er den anbefalte fremgangsmåten er at.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> is not cached after the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A> method completes.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>hurtigbufres ikke etter den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A>metoden er fullført.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> to use during transformation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> skal brukes under transformering.

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the XSLT `document()` function is not resolved.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, XSLT `document()` funksjonen ikke er løst.
